mapper.insert: insert into osf_notifications (notify_type,notify_id, object_type, object_id, notified_user, notifier) values(#{notify_type},#{notify_id}, #{object_type}, #{object_id}, #{notified_user}, #{notifier})
mapper.select: select * from osf_notifications where notified_user=#{param1} and notify_type=#{param2} order by ts desc";
